spatial_accuracy.notes: Severe layout distortion. The staircase, which is central in the 2D plan, has been reimagined as a central furniture island. The utility room and WC placement do not match the blueprint's upper-center cluster. Window distribution along the left wall is inconsistent with the plan's spacing.

structural_fidelity.notes: Model follows the floating floor-cutaway requirement and avoids UI/labels. However, there are significant structural re-interpretations of wall alignments and room adjacencies. The bay window/window seat area is missing from the right-hand wall.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen cabinetry is present but misplaced. The dining table is enclosed in a small room not present in the original open-plan dining area. Hallucinated bed and sofa elements added to the central zone.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent adherence to style constraints. Correct isometric orthographic projection, clean low-poly geometry, flat shading, and a dark neutral background.

detected_errors.description: Staircase and wall layout distorted; dining area enclosed into a separate room contrary to open plan.
Central staircase reimagined as a bed/seating platform; hallucinated wall partitions.
Missing bay window (window seat) on the right elevation and specific utility room layout.
